short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle dark mode on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you toggle between light and dark modes, ensuring a comfortable browsing experience on your favourite websites. Perfect for night-time browsing or reducing eye strain.
